response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is truly a game-changer in its category. It comes with a wide range of features designed to meet your specific needs. Considering its quality and functionality, I believe it's worth more than its face value of $120. I am offering it to you today at an exclusive price of $150. This is an opportunity to secure a high-quality item at a special rate. Please let me know if this offer suits your budget and preferences.", "product_price": 150}
